dcl_constantbuffer cb3[4], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[15], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v3.z
dcl_input v6.xyzw
dcl_input v7.xyzw
dcl_input v8.xyzw
dcl_input v9.xyzw

dcl_output o1.xy

dcl_temps 8

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r7.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

add r0.x, cb2[0].z, -cb2[1].z
max r0.x, r0.x, l(1.000000)
min r0.x, r0.x, l(1.500000)
log r0.y, |v3.z|
mul r0.y, r0.y, l(0.100000)
exp r0.y, r0.y
mul r0.y, r0.y, cb1[20].z
mul r0.z, cb1[17].y, cb1[17].y
mul r0.z, r0.z, cb4[13].z
itof r1.xyzw, v1.xyzw
mad r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, cb3[2].zwzw, cb3[2].xyxy
mad r1.zw, r1.zzzw, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, -1.000000), l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000)
mul o1.xy, r1.xyxx, cb1[9].xyxx
mad r1.xy, r1.zwzz, l(20.000000, 20.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), l(-10.000000, -10.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
itof r2.xyz, v0.xyzx
mad r2.xyz, r2.xyzx, cb3[3].yyyy, cb3[3].xxxx
add r1.xy, r1.xyxx, -r2.xyxx
dp2 r3.x, r1.xyxx, v6.xyxx
dp2 r3.y, r1.xyxx, v7.xyxx
dp2 r3.z, r1.xyxx, v8.xyxx
mov r1.x, v6.w
mov r1.y, v7.w
mov r1.z, v8.w
itof r4.xyzw, v9.xyzw
add r1.xyw, r1.xyxz, r4.xyxz
mad r0.w, r4.w, l(0.00781273842), l(256.000000)
mov r4.w, r1.x
mov r4.xyz, v6.xyzx
mul r2.xyz, r0.wwww, r2.xyzx
mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
dp3 r5.x, r2.xywx, r4.xywx
dp4 r4.x, r2.xyzw, r4.xyzw
mov r6.w, r1.y
mov r6.xyz, v7.xyzx
dp3 r5.y, r2.xywx, r6.xywx
dp4 r4.y, r2.xyzw, r6.xyzw
mov r1.xyz, v8.xyzx
dp3 r5.z, r2.xywx, r1.xywx
dp4 r4.z, r2.xyzw, r1.xyzw
mad r1.xyz, r3.xyzx, r0.wwww, r5.xyzx
add r2.xy, r1.xyxx, -cb0[183].xyxx
dp2 r1.w, r2.xyxx, r2.xyxx
mul_sat r0.z, r0.z, r1.w
add r0.z, -r0.z, l(1.000000)
mul r0.y, r0.z, r0.y
mul r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
mad r0.yz, r1.xxyx, cb4[0].xxyx, cb4[0].zzwz
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, r0.yzyy, t0.xyzw, s0, l(0.000000)
mad r0.y, r2.z, cb4[14].x, cb4[14].y
add r0.y, -r0.y, r1.z
add r0.y, |r0.y|, l(-0.500000)
mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, cb1[18].y
add r0.y, -r0.y, l(1.000000)
mul r0.y, r2.w, r0.y
mad r2.xy, r2.xyxx, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
mul r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
mul r0.yz, r0.xxxx, r2.xxyx
mov_sat r0.x, r0.x
mad r2.xyz, r3.xyzx, r0.wwww, r4.xyzx
mul r3.xyz, r0.wwww, r3.xyzx
add r1.xyz, -r1.xyzx, r2.xyzx
mul r0.yz, r0.yyzy, r1.zzzz
dp2 r1.w, r3.xyxx, r0.yzyy
mul r2.xy, r0.wwww, r0.yzyy
mul_sat r0.y, r1.w, l(5.000000)
mad r0.yzw, r0.yyyy, r3.xxyz, r4.xxyz
dp2 r1.w, r2.xyxx, r2.xyxx
sqrt r1.w, r1.w
add r1.w, r1.w, l(0.000100)
dp3 r2.w, r1.xyzx, r1.xyzx
sqrt r2.w, r2.w
add r2.w, r2.w, l(0.000100)
min r3.x, r1.w, r2.w
div r1.xyz, r1.xyzx, r2.wwww
mul r1.xyz, r3.xxxx, r1.xyzx
mov r2.z, l(0)
div r2.xyz, r2.xyzx, r1.wwww
mad r1.xyz, r2.xyzx, r3.xxxx, -r1.xyzx
add r0.yzw, r0.yyzw, r1.xxyz
add r0.yzw, -r4.xxyz, r0.yyzw
mad r0.xyz, r0.xxxx, r0.yzwy, r4.xyzx
add r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, -cb0[174].xyzx
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r1.x, r0.xyzw, cb0[58].xyzw
dp4 r1.y, r0.xyzw, cb0[59].xyzw
mul r2.xy, r1.xyxx, cb0[66].xyxx
mul o0.xy, r2.xyxx, l(0.00390625000, -0.00390625000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
dp4 r1.w, r0.xyzw, cb0[61].xyzw
dp4 o2.z, r0.xyzw, cb0[60].xyzw

// Relocated to here with asmtool.py
mov o2.xyw, r1.xyxw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 5bee664a2fd42617-vs.txt
ne r7.w, r1.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r7.w
  add r7.w, r1.w, -r7.y
  mad r1.x, r7.w, r7.x, r1.x
endif

mov o0.z, r1.w

// mov o2.xyw, r1.xyxw // Relocated from here with asmtool.py

ret 
// Approximately 92 instruction slots used
